data.message:
I have some awesome ideas for FB:
1. leave peoples setting of "Most Recent" and "Popular" (~) alone. let them decide what they want to see.
2. show them the content of their choosing.. not omitting stuff and then FB filling in space with recommended pages.. 
3. when using the search box. show peoples liked pages.

replies.message: Hey there, James. We listen to all the feedback and ideas that we get from the Facebook community. If you have anymore suggestions, we'd love to hear from you: http://on.fb.me/1hTGK3S. Thanks! -Kate

Do U really cause I doubt that seeing as U always change the look and most can't stand the changes U change without asking us.. Would be different if we could opt out..I liked my page just the way it was
